mapper.insert: insert into T_STOCK_DAY (stockcode, opertime, openprice, highprice, lowprice, closeprice, volume, turnover) values( #{stockCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{openPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{highPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lowPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{closePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{volume,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{turnover,jdbcType=INTEGER})
